VideoTitle: A Word from XBOX's Major Nelson & Recap of the NYC 2016 Global Game Jam
Author: Stacey Mulcahy

VideoTitle: Using Visual Studio Code with Unity on OSX
Author: Stacey Mulcahy
Description: Need a different code editor on your Mac for your Unity development? In this tutorial, we'll go through how to set up Visual Studio Code to work with Unity and get features needed such as Intellisense

VideoTitle: A day in the life of a demo'ing Indie Game Dev
Author: Stacey Mulcahy
Description: Follow Nikola Kostic, a local NYC indie game developer, as his day from start to end is documented as he preps to demo his game at Playcrafting's Winter Expo on January 28th at the Microsoft offices.
